title: do. something. about. remakes
body: theyre a complete waste of time and the best part is we get nothing in return

replies.body: You get to play through a 4v5 for 3 minutes instead of 15 and you don't lose LP on the surrender if you're playing ranked. I'd say that makes it a rather worthy feature.

Wait a second, you're upset about a feature that allows us to not waste ~15-20 minutes on a 4v5 because someone disconnected at the beginning of the match? You think it's "getting nothing in return" when you don't have to lose LP for said ~15-20 minutes of 4v5?
